page.title: 06The Voe Hall.
page.content:
Voe has had two halls. The first hall was blown down by a gale on Christmas Eve in 1945.As it was wooden ,all that remained was the concrete foundations. The present hall was built in the summer of 1947.It has been extended twice.The following activities are held in the hall:
{MONDAY MORNING : PLAYGROUP {WEDNESDAY EVENING: BADMINTON {THURSDAY MORNING : PLAYGROUP {THURSDAY EVENING : CUBS {SATURDAY MORNING : SATURDAY SCHOOL
Other activities are held in the hall at weekends such as concerts,supper dances,wedding receptions,meetings, sales,and Christmas parties. Local residents form a committee which is responsible for the organisation of these events.
